++ABOUT PANDA RADIO++
Our fast and convenient worldwide radio extension will open to you the world of the online radio broadcasting. With Panda Radio you can listen to worldwide radio directly in your browser! Use â€œSearchâ€ to find your favorite radio stations or simply select something new to your taste! We would also like to emphasize that you can save your favorite online radio stations in the â€œFavoritesâ€ section to make sure they are always at your fingertips.


++GETTING STARTED WITH PANDA RADIO++
ğŸ‘‰ 01. Click on the blue "Add to Chrome" button at the top right to add the panda radio extension to your Chrome browser.

ğŸ‘‰ 02. Click on the "SUBSCRIBE" button and you will be redirected to the registration page.

++WHAT TO LISTEN TO++
In our â€œGenresâ€ section, you can listen to online radio(music, etc.) of any style you like. No matter what you are looking for: heavy metal, 1960s retro or drum-n-bass - here you will always find your favorite online radio! And of course do not forget talk-show formats: news, sports, weather, politics, business, education, and religion - all theme-oriented online radio stations are available on our extension! Moreover, on the page with the list of radio stations we show the names of the radio stations that are currently playing. You can switch from one online radio station to the next simply by clicking the "play" icon before the radio station you want to listen to.
